channel.title: 12 Train
channel.description:
Jason, Brandon and Wade sit around and talk about anything that comes up and then they go from there.
Completely off track conversations.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Off Track Talk Radio
channel.itunes:author: 12 Train
channel.itunes:summary:
Jason, Brandon and Wade sit around and talk about anything that comes up and then they go from there.
Completely off track conversations.

item.title: I Don't Owe You a Hug!
item.description:
Jason is pulled over for driving while black | Jason meets his long lost grandma | Jason's Dad wants a hug and is denied | Wade is moving downtown | Context in texting | Band of The Week: Mates of State - "Punchline" | Langerado Music Festival cancelled due to the economy | Record Stores closing | The difference between stealing music and stealing music | Watchmen | Twittering | Buttons on facebook | Shannon bought me tickets | Jason get's backing on the Nick and Nora sittuation | The hats Jason wears during movies | ::News:: | Prince Inks All Over Targets Face! | Michael Jackson - Farewell | Spinal Tap | Sublime | Woodstock 2009 | Journey an American Idol band? | No Doubt Reunion | Heavy Metal: By David Fincher | Chuck Palahniuk is a D-Bag | Jason and Big Lebowski and Black People | Faith No More | The Beatles - 09.09.09 | Wilco: Wilco the Song | Radiohead makes Miley Cyrus cry | Who is she?
Join the facebook group: Search 12train Find us on twitter: www.twitter.com/12train visit 12train.com http://podcastalley.com/one_vote2.php?pod_id=23594
